title: Truly madly deeply
creator_credit: Anthony Minghella, Robert Cooper and BBC Film Unit
brief_description: Acclaimed British actors Juliet Stevenson and Alan Rickman star in this wonderfully moving story of love, loss and letting go. Nina lives in her rat-infested flat where she spends most of her time grieving for her dead lover, Jamie. As if in answer to her dreams, Jamie re-enters her life but Nina discovers that living in the past could mean a life without a future.
